Laws of reflection: angle of incidence = angle of reflection
Normal, incident ray, reflected ray

Distance of image from mirror = distance of object from mirror

Convex mirror: diverging mirror, basic properties

Dispersion of white light by prism into seven colours (VIBGYOR)

Laboratory thermometer: range -10C to 110C

Celsius scale
